description: Unique identifier for a field metadata record in the system.
Technical column name associated with the field in its underlying table.
Logical data type of the field, guiding storage, validation, and UI controls.
Human-readable description explaining the fieldâ€™s purpose and how it should be used.
Business domain within fleet operations where the field applies.
Name of the application table that contains the column this field describes.
Preferred display and input formatting for the field, such as masks, precision, length, or datetime formats.
Boolean flag indicating whether the field can be updated across multiple records in a single operation.
Boolean flag indicating whether the field is available as a filter or criterion in advanced searches.
